feature1.explanation: Both texts make use of hyphens and commas to set off additional information within sentences.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a preference for advanced vocabulary and complex sentence structures.

feature3.explanation: Both texts display a tendency towards longer and more convoluted sentences with a formal tone.

feature4.explanation: Both texts convey a serious and analytical tone towards the subject matter.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, and text discourse features, along with the absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate to high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
